Verses.24: Do you not know that in a race, all the runners run, but only one gets the prize? Run so that you may win.
Verses.25: Everyone who competes in the games exercises self-control in all things. They do it to receive a crown that will perish. We do it for a reward that is imperishable.
Verses.26: Therefore, I do not run like one who runs aimlessly. I do not box like one beating the air.
Verses.27: Rather, I discipline my body and keep it under my control. So that after I have preached to others, I will not have disqualified myself.

Changes: 2024-03-03 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 24-27.
